jetpack-related-posts.title: Submit Salesforce Events
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: If you know of any Salesforce Events that are happening, please fill out this Google Form with the information. Or if you have any information on the events that are missing info, please fill out the Event Form below as well.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Events
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Submit Salesforce Events Form Salesforce Events 20182018 EventsSalesforce Events 20202020 Events

jetpack-related-posts.title: Ideas
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Salesforce IdeasThe IdeaExchange was designed so that we would have the opportunity to share what we, as the end users of Salesforce, the people that use it everyday, want and need as features and functionality.It's awesome. It's one of the most amazing, dare I even say revolutionary opportunities that we…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Inspector
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: I love, love, love it! I love the Salesforce Inspector, I use it multiple times a day every single day, you can find the field requirements, field type, API names, export data, import data, and more!

jetpack-related-posts.title: 404 Error
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Oops! That Was a Bad Link Looks like that link you clicked doesn’t exist or has an error/typo. Oh no!Well, no need to panic, I have been notified of the link and where it was posted so I can update it.  While you’re here, feel free to check out some…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Make A Mobile Publisher App for Communities Hands-on Virtual Workshop
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: This virtual workshop was to learn how to build rich digital experiences for your partners using External Apps, enabling them to collaborate on data and processes that live both inside and outside of Salesforce. Then publish that experience to the web and to the App Store or Google Play and…
